item.title: Aspose.Slides for C++ 22.12 Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes for Aspose.Slides for C++ 22.12 Supported Platforms Aspose.Slides for C++ for Windows x64/x86 (Microsoft Visual Studio 2017 or later).
